results.overview: Following the death of his father, young Danny Madigan takes comfort in watching action movies featuring the indestructible Los Angeles cop Jack Slater. After being given a magic ticket by theater manager Nick, Danny is sucked into the screen and bonds with Slater. When evil fictional villain Benedict gets his hands on the ticket and enters the real world, Danny and Jack must follow and stop him.
results.title: Last Action Hero

results.original_title: In Search of the Last Action Heroes
results.overview: The most comprehensive retrospective of the '80s action film genre ever made.
results.title: In Search of the Last Action Heroes
